mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.user_name FROM article a JOIN user u ON a.article_writer = u.user_id WHERE board_id = #{board_id} ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT article (board_id, article_title, article_content, article_writer, reply_count) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{article_title}, #{article_content}, #{article_writer}, #{reply_count})
